div.l: Wo durste be so bold to disparage
My doughter þat is comen of swich lynage
And by þe þrote bolle he caughte Alayn
And he hente him dispytously agayn
And on þe nose he smote him with his fiste
Down ran þe blody streme vppon his briste
And in þe flore wiþ nose ⁊and mouthe to broke
Thei walew as doth two pigges in a poke
And vp þey gon and down a gayn anon
Til þat þe meller spurned at a ston
And down he fil bakward vp on his wif
That wist no thyng of þis nyse stryf
For she was falle a slepe a lytul wight
With Iohn þe clerk þat waked had al þe nyght
And with þe falle out of hir͗e slepe she brayde
Help holy crosse of Bromholm she sayde
In manus tuas lord to þe I calle
A wake Simond þe fende is on me falle
Myn hert is broken help I am but dede
Þere lyth oon vp myn wombe ⁊and vp myn hede
Help Symlyn for þe fals clerkes fighte
This Iohn start vp as faste as eủere he myght
And graspede bi þe walles to and froo
To fynden a staff and she sterte vp also
And knew þe estris bet þan did þat Iohn
And by þe walle she fonde a noon
And saugh a litel shymeryng of a light
For at an hole In shone þe mone bright
And by þat light she saugh hem boþe two
But sikirly she nyste ho was wo
But as she saugh a wight þyng in hir͗e eye
And whan she gan þis wight þing aspye
She wende þe clerk had wered a voluper͗e
And with þe staf she dronke ay ner͗e ⁊and ner͗e
And wende han hitte þis Aleyn atte fulle
And smote þe meller͗e on þe pilede sculle
